Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw two students communicating over a distance using a string telephone.
The student can show the string connecting two cups, representing the path for sound travel.
The student can illustrate that sound travels through the string in the string telephone.
The student can represent the concept that the device allows communication, even over distances.
The student can use the provided tools and materials in the drawing to reflect the solution design.
The student can show how technology, like a string telephone, impacts communication over long distances.
